Topic.Title: Don't Like Username | Could Staff Delete My Account?

Posts.EditableText: Perhaps in the future, the ability to change one's username will happen. But for now, would a staff member be so kind as to delete my account? I've backed up my game, info, etc., so everything is ready. Thanks!
